sentences.sContent: They performed some amazing acrobatic feats.
sentences.sCn: 他们表演了一些令人惊叹的杂技动作。

words.tran: 杂技演员，特技演员；随机应变者；翻云覆雨者，善变者

trans.tranCn: 杂技的； 杂技般的； 杂技演员的
trans.tranOther: acrobatic movements involve moving your body in a very skilful way, for example by jumping through the air or balancing on a rope
